data.title: University of Waterloo
data.text:
Login Details

Register using your professional email associated with your organization. This is the email that we will use to communicate with you.

Email:*

Your password must be at least 8 characters. It must include a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, a special character ! @ # \ $ % ^ & * and a number.

Password:*

visibility

Reset Password

Click the 'Send Email to User' button below to send the Reset Password Link to the user. They will receive a link to their email which allows them to reset their password.

Contact Details

Salutation:

Salutation

First Name:* Middle Name: Last Name:* Position Title:* A WaterlooWorks employer account is required to post jobs and recruit students. If you are attempting to access a colleague's account or submit a Student Performance Evaluation, please connect with your Hiring Process Support or contact the ceehub@uwaterloo.ca.

Are you taking over someone else's account in WaterlooWorks?:

Yes No
